News.Title: Nahar Industrial Forms Wholly Owned Subsidiary
News.Summary: Nahar Industrial Enterprises incorporates Oswal Silchar Logipark Private Limited as wholly owned subsidiary with ₹1.00 lakh share capital for warehousing and storage business operations.

News.Title: Nahar Industrial Creates New Subsidiary for Warehousing Operations
News.Summary: Nahar Industrial has established a new subsidiary called Niel Gorakhpur Logipark Private Limited to operate in the warehousing and storage business. This expansion into logistics infrastructure represents the company's diversification strategy into the growing warehousing sector.

News.Title: Nahar Industrial Enterprises to Close Down 30-Year-Old Spinning Unit Due to Non-Viability
News.Summary: Nahar Industrial Enterprises Limited decided to shut down its Arham Spinning Mills unit in Bhiwadi, Rajasthan by March 31, 2026, citing operational non-viability of the approximately 30-year-old facility. The spinning unit contributed Rs. 239.21 crores in turnover (15.63% of total company turnover) but resulted in a Rs. 14.16 crore loss for the financial year ended March 31, 2025.

News.Title: Nahar Industrial Enterprises to Discontinue Operations and Dispose Entire Stake in Subsidiary Logipark Kolkata
News.Summary: Nahar Industrial Enterprises Limited announced it will discontinue business operations in its wholly owned subsidiary, Logipark Kolkata Private Limited, and dispose of its entire shareholding. The subsidiary was incorporated on April 8, 2025, with a net worth of Rs. One lakh and nil turnover. The company will transfer 10,000 equity shares of Rs. 10 each on September 19, 2025, for a consideration of Rs. One lakh. The buyers are Mr. Om Prakash, Mr. Jugjiven Singh and others, who do not belong to the promoter or promoter group. The transaction does not fall within related party transactions.

News.Title: Nahar Industrial Enterprises Approves Q1 FY2026 Results and Key Board Appointments
News.Summary: Nahar Industrial Enterprises Ltd. held a board meeting on August 12, 2025, approving unaudited financial results for the quarter ended June 30, 2025. The company reported net sales of Rs. 38,762.31 lacs and net profit of Rs. 398.73 lacs for the quarter. The board also approved the re-appointment of Sh. Abhinav Oswal as Executive Director for five years from September 1, 2025, to August 31, 2030. Additionally, three Independent Directors - Dr. Manisha Gupta, Dr. Roshan Lal Behl, and Sh. Parvinder Singh Pruthi - were re-appointed for second terms of five years starting August 14, 2025. All appointments are subject to shareholder approval at the Annual General Meeting scheduled for September 29, 2025. The company operates in textile and sugar segments, with textile contributing Rs. 31,816.61 lacs and sugar contributing Rs. 6,939.58 lacs to quarterly revenue.

News.Title: Nahar Industrial Enterprise Reports Strong Q1 Profit Growth Despite Margin Decline
News.Summary: Nahar Industrial Enterprise reported Q1 net profit of 40 million rupees, significantly higher than 7 million rupees in the same period last year. Revenue increased to 3.9 billion rupees from 3.5 billion rupees year-over-year. EBITDA grew marginally to 152 million rupees from 150 million rupees, though EBITDA margin declined to 3.91% from 4.23% in the previous year.

News.Title: Nahar Industrial Enterprise Reports Q4 Financial Results
News.Summary: Nahar Industrial Enterprise has released its Q4 financial results. The company's EBITDA increased to 320.2 million rupees from 300.4 million rupees year-over-year. The EBITDA margin improved slightly to 8.23% from 8.1%. Revenue grew to 3.9 billion rupees from 3.71 billion rupees in the same period last year. However, consolidated net profit decreased to 161.8 million rupees from 191.2 million rupees year-over-year, but increased from 46.3 million rupees quarter-over-quarter.

News.Title: Nahar Industrial Enterprise Reports Decline in Q3 EBITDA and Margin
News.Summary: Nahar Industrial Enterprise has reported a decrease in its third quarter EBITDA, which fell to 159 million rupees from 175 million rupees year-over-year. The company's EBITDA margin also declined, dropping to 3.70% from 4.80% in the same period last year.

News.Title: Nahar Industrial Enterprise Reports Q3 Financial Results
News.Summary: Nahar Industrial Enterprise has released its Q3 financial results. The company reported a consolidated net profit of 46 million rupees, compared to 50 million rupees in the same quarter last year. Revenue for Q3 increased to 4.3 billion rupees from 3.6 billion rupees in the previous year.

News.Title: Nahar Industrial Enterprise Reports Significant Q2 EBITDA Growth
News.Summary: Nahar Industrial Enterprise has reported a substantial increase in its Q2 EBITDA, rising to 85 million rupees from 26 million rupees in the same quarter last year. The company's EBITDA margin also improved, increasing to 2.40% from 0.75% year-over-year.

News.Title: Nahar Industrial Enterprise Reports Q2 Financial Results
News.Summary: Nahar Industrial Enterprise has reported its Q2 consolidated financial results. The company posted a net loss of 32 million rupees, which is an improvement from the 85 million rupee loss in the same quarter last year. Compared to the previous quarter, the company showed a profit of 8 million rupees. Q2 revenue increased to 3.54 billion rupees from 3.44 billion rupees year-over-year.
